name: Discord Game Server Monitor
description: Monitor your game servers on Discord

DGSM_TOKEN.description: Bot token - You can get it on https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/

SERVERS_JSON_URL.description: servers.json download url (You can set it later)

SETTINGS_JSON_URL.description: settings.json download url (You can set it later)

TZ.description: Set Time Zone as per your requirements for Update Time

ROLE_ID.description: Role ID which has access to the comamnds. They can modify any server file at any given time

IMAGE_URL.description: Image URL for Maps images (just add upto maps directory)
